com.aylanetworks.aylasdk

类 AylaSystemSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.AylaSystemSettings

  • public class AylaSystemSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    Settings and configuration class used to initialize the Ayla library. Application developers must provide the SDK an instance of this object filled out with application-specific information by calling AylaNetworks.initialize(com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.AylaSystemSettings).

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  AylaSystemSettings.DeviceDetailProvider
      The DeviceDetailProvider interface is used by the SDK to obtain information about devices it is managing.
      static class  AylaSystemSettings.ServiceLocation
      Service locations
      static class  AylaSystemSettings.ServiceType
      ServiceType enumeration

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      boolean allowDSS
      To enable or disable datastreaming feature in this app
      boolean allowLANConnectionToSharedDevices
      If true, allows devices that are shared with the local account to be accessible in LAN mode.

      To enable or disable offline use of this app.

      Application ID provided by Ayla Networks for your app.

      Application secret provided by AylaNetworks for your app.

      Context used for notifications, component initialization, etc.
      int defaultNetworkTimeoutMs
      The default timeout for network operations
      AylaSystemSettings.DeviceDetailProvider deviceDetailProvider
      Interface that provides details about devices in the system.
      boolean disableMetricsService
      To enable or disable upload of logs and metrics to Ayla Log service
      boolean disableUncaughtExceptionHandler
      Indicates whether the SDK is allowed to implement its own UncaughtExceptionHandler interface.

      Sender ID for push notifications.

    • 字段详细资料

      • context

        public android.content.Context context
        Context used for notifications, component initialization, etc. This should be a permanent context such as the Application context. If the context is an Activity, be sure to call updateContext() if the context changes.

      • appId

        public java.lang.String appId
        Application ID provided by Ayla Networks for your app. This must be set correctly in order to connect to the cloud service.

      • appSecret

        public java.lang.String appSecret
        Application secret provided by AylaNetworks for your app. This must be set correctly in order to connect to the cloud service.

      • serviceType

        public AylaSystemSettings.ServiceType serviceType
        Service to connect to. Generally during development, the Development service is used, while in production, Field service is used.

      • serviceLocation

        public AylaSystemSettings.ServiceLocation serviceLocation
        Location of the service to connect to. Set this to the region your application will be accessed from.

      • deviceDetailProvider

        public AylaSystemSettings.DeviceDetailProvider deviceDetailProvider
        Interface that provides details about devices in the system.

      • allowDSS

        public boolean allowDSS
        To enable or disable datastreaming feature in this app

      • allowOfflineUse

        public boolean allowOfflineUse
        To enable or disable offline use of this app. Devices in LAN mode can be controlled in offline mode.

      • defaultNetworkTimeoutMs

        public int defaultNetworkTimeoutMs
        The default timeout for network operations

      • pushNotificationSenderId

        public java.lang.String pushNotificationSenderId
        Sender ID for push notifications. Android-specific.

      • disableUncaughtExceptionHandler

        public boolean disableUncaughtExceptionHandler
        Indicates whether the SDK is allowed to implement its own UncaughtExceptionHandler interface.

      • disableMetricsService

        public boolean disableMetricsService
        To enable or disable upload of logs and metrics to Ayla Log service

      • allowLANConnectionToSharedDevices

        public boolean allowLANConnectionToSharedDevices
        If true, allows devices that are shared with the local account to be accessible in LAN mode. WARNING: Access control to the device via Roles is not supported in LAN mode. Shared devices in LAN mode will respond to the LAN commands as if the account holder were the owner of the device. Applications may read and write to devices in LAN mode even if the device was shared with "read-only" access.

      • dssSubscriptionTypes

        public java.lang.String[] dssSubscriptionTypes

    • 构造器详细资料

        public AylaSystemSettings()
        Default constructor

      • AylaSystemSettings

        public AylaSystemSettings(AylaSystemSettings other)
        Copy constructor
        参数:
        other - AylaSystemSettings object to copy values from
